name: Rogue Without Legs
description:
Install instructions

You can run the code with python3 in windows cmd or linux terminal. Migth also work in OS X but I haven't tested.

You can also make an account to pythonanywhere.com, upload the file, open new Bash console and type: "python3 RogueWithoutLegs.py" and it should work. Similar websites may also work, but I tested this one.
